system.loading_wynnpack.finish: Thank you for using the WynnPack. Enjoy the game!
system.alert.class_change: Your class has automatically been selected. Use /class to change your class, or /toggle autojoin to turn this feature off.
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.1: [1/3] Tasim: So this is Wynn, huh?
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.2: [2/3] Aledar: It looks nice. The war clearly hasn't made it this far.
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.3: [3/3] Old Man: Hey, you three! Come over here and talk to me.
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.10: [1/1] Tasim: Hey, kyaco! Don't leave yet, let's talk to this old man. Right-click on him to talk.
quest.king's_recruit.stage2.11: [1/1] Tasim: Right-click on the old man to talk to him.
